hero.title: Cleaning & maintenance —
hero.subtitle: Choose your service, send your request in minutes, and receive a tailored offer. Transparent, reliable, and without extra effort.

appInstall.title: Install Havenova as an app — on any device.
appInstall.description: Use Havenova like a native app: faster access, better performance, and a clear overview of your requests — on mobile, tablet, or desktop.

appInstalled.title: Havenova is ready to use.
appInstalled.description: You’re all set. Manage your home services, track requests, and stay in control — all from one place.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Two clear paths — choose the right service and send your request in minutes.

items.title: Cleaning
items.description: Reliable cleaning for apartments, stairwells, and common areas — tailored to your needs.

items.title: Maintenance & home service
items.description: Small repairs, upkeep, and practical help at home — quickly arranged and transparently coordinated.

benefits.title: Comfortable for customers — efficient for the team.
benefits.description: Havenova reduces back-and-forth, clarifies requests, and keeps workflows clean: fewer misunderstandings, faster quotes, better planning.

items.title: Clear requests
items.description: Forms collect exactly the information needed — without stress.

items.title: Faster quotes
items.description: Fewer follow-ups, quicker matching, better response times.

items.title: Better planning
items.description: Services can be prioritized and coordinated with clarity.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Status and communication in one place — clear for both sides.

hero.title: Home services, simplified — for customers and for service teams.
hero.description: Havenova is the company behind this platform for cleaning and home maintenance. We helped build a streamlined workflow so customers can request help in minutes and service companies can manage requests, scheduling, and updates efficiently.

workflow.title: How the workflow works
workflow.subtitle: A practical flow that keeps requests structured — without forcing fixed prices or complicated forms.

steps.title: Request & review
steps.description: You send a service request with the relevant details. We review the information carefully to understand your needs and prepare the next step.

steps.title: Visit & confirmation
steps.description: We visit the location to check the details on site. Based on this visit, we confirm the scope of the work and send you the final offer.

steps.title: Service & completion
steps.description: We carry out the service as agreed and keep you informed throughout the process. Once everything is completed, we send you the invoice.

note.title: Why we don’t show fixed prices on the website
note.description: Many home services depend on context (size, condition, materials, access, time). Havenova keeps requests structured so the company can price fairly — and the customer knows exactly what is included.

benefits.title: Benefits for both sides
benefits.description: This platform was created to build long-term relationships between Havenova and its customers, based on trust, clarity, and shared information. It ensures you always know what was requested, what was agreed, and what was delivered. Ready to request your first service?

register.title: Create account
register.description: Become part of Havenova and book your first service.

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: Keep your details up to date to ensure a seamless service experience.

forgotPasswordText.title: Reset your password
forgotPasswordText.info: To create a new password, please enter your email address. We will send you a link to reset your password. Follow the instructions in the email to set a new password for your account.

resetPasswordText.title: Set a new password
resetPasswordText.info: Please enter your new password below. The password must be at least 8 characters long.

verifyEmail.title: Email Verification
verifyEmail.info: If you have not received any email, please try again.

input.info: Please use the same email address you used to create your profile.

profile.manageAccount: Manage your account settings, and view your profile information.
profile.name: Name:
profile.notLoggedInText: To access and manage your profile, please log in to your Havenova account. This way, you can view your personal information, track your service requests, and update your preferences.

hero.subtitle: This Privacy Policy explains how personal data is processed on this platform, which is technically operated by Maped Solutions UG.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Protecting personal data is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains who is responsible for data processing, for which purposes data is processed, and what rights users have.
bullets: Data Controller: The respective client operating this platform (Art. 4(7) GDPR).
Data Processor: Maped Solutions UG (Art. 28 GDPR).
Legal bases: Contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b)), legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)), legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f)).
Preferred data processing location: European Union.
International transfers only with appropriate safeguards (SCC).

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.body: The data controller within the meaning of the GDPR is the company offering services through this platform. This company determines the purposes and means of data processing. Contact details are provided in the Imprint.

processor.title: Data Processor
processor.body: Maped Solutions UG acts as a data processor pursuant to Art. 28 GDPR. It operates and maintains the platform technically and processes personal data solely on the instructions of the controller.

purposesAndLegalBases.title: Purposes and Legal Bases
purposesAndLegalBases.intro: Personal data is processed exclusively for lawful and clearly defined purposes.

examples.title: Examples:
examples.description: user accounts, service requests, communication, invoicing

examples.title: Examples:
examples.description: server logs, abuse prevention, system security

dataCategories.title: Categories of Data
dataCategories.description: Depending on platform usage, the following data may be processed:
items: Identification and contact data (name, email address, phone number, address).
Account and security data (encrypted passwords, roles, language settings).
Contractual and payment data (invoices, payments via third parties).
Technical data (IP address, device information, server logs, strictly necessary cookies).

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdParties.subtitle: This overview refers to technical providers that may be required to operate the platform (e.g., hosting, email delivery, payment processing).
thirdParties.intro: No providers are used for analytics or marketing.

body.name: Vercel
body.purpose: Frontend hosting and operations, technical logs

body.name: Cloudflare R2
body.purpose: Storage and delivery of static assets

security.title: Security Measures
security.body: Appropriate technical and organizational measures pursuant to Art. 32 GDPR are implemented, including encrypted passwords, secure data transmission (HTTPS/TLS), role-based access control, and firewall/CDN protection.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: This platform uses only strictly necessary cookies required for secure operation and core functionality. No analytics or marketing cookies are used.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: Data subjects have the following rights under the GDPR:
items: Access (Art. 15), rectification (Art. 16), erasure (Art. 17), restriction of processing (Art. 18).
Withdrawal of consent (Art. 7(3)) where processing is based on consent.
Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (Art. 77).
userRights.howTo: Requests must be addressed to the respective data controller. We may request identification and generally respond within one month.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.body: Personal data is stored only for as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purposes and legal obligations. Thereafter, data is deleted or anonymized.

items.title: Requirement to provide data
items.body: Providing personal data is necessary to use the platform. Without this data, registration and use of the services are not possible.

items.title: Data sources
items.body: We process data you provide as well as technical usage data generated when using the platform (e.g., log files).

items.title: Automated decision-making
items.body: No automated decision-making, including profiling within the meaning of Art. 22 GDPR, takes place.

items.title: Privacy contact
items.body: If a Data Protection Officer is appointed, their contact details will be provided in the Imprint or upon request.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.body: If personal data is processed outside the EEA, this occurs exclusively with appropriate safeguards, in particular the Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.body: This Privacy Policy may be updated for legal or operational reasons.

items.label: European Data Protection Board – Supervisory authorities

hero.subtitle: This Cookie Policy explains how and why cookies are used on this platform, which is technically operated by Maped Solutions UG.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: This platform uses only strictly necessary cookies required for secure operation and essential functionality. No analytics, tracking, or marketing cookies are used.
bullets: Only strictly necessary cookies are used.
Cookies can be managed through browser settings.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.body: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They enable essential functions such as secure login, navigation, and protection against misuse.

types.title: What types of cookies are used?

items.name: Strictly necessary cookies
items.description: These cookies are required to ensure the secure and proper operation of the platform, such as authentication, security, and session management. They cannot be disabled.

thirdParties.title: Third-party services
thirdParties.body: No third-party cookies are used for analytics, tracking, or marketing purposes. External service providers may set technically necessary cookies if required for platform operation.

localStorage.title: Use of localStorage
localStorage.body: In addition to cookies, the browser’s localStorage may be used to store technical preferences such as language or theme settings. This data remains on your device and is not shared with third parties.

management.title: Managing cookies
management.intro: You can manage or delete cookies at any time via your browser settings. Disabling strictly necessary cookies may affect the functionality of the platform.
methods: Delete stored cookies via the browser.
Restrict or block cookies using browser features.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
legalBasis.body: Strictly necessary cookies are used based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in ensuring secure and functional operation of the platform).

changes.title: Changes to this Cookie Policy
changes.body: This Cookie Policy may be updated for legal or technical reasons. The date of the last update is displayed on this page.

hero.subtitle: These Terms of Service govern the use of this platform and define the rights and obligations of the involved parties.

overview.title: Scope
overview.intro: These Terms of Service apply to the use of the functions and services provided through this platform.
bullets: The platform is technically operated by Maped Solutions UG.
Services are provided by the respective client.
Maped Solutions UG does not provide end-user services.
Deviating terms apply only if explicitly agreed.

items.definition: The web-based software solution for managing services and requests.
The company offering services to end users through the platform.
Individuals or legal entities using the platform.
Maped Solutions UG as the technical operator of the platform.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.body: Maped Solutions UG provides the client with a production-ready software platform (Version 1.0). The service includes technical operation, maintenance, and continuous optimization.
serviceDescription.note: The platform does not act as a service provider or intermediary for the services offered.

optimization.title: Continuous Optimization
optimization.body: Continuous optimization includes technical improvements, security updates, bug fixes, and performance adjustments. Functional extensions require a separate agreement.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
items: No misuse or unlawful use of the platform.

availability.title: Availability
availability.body: Maped Solutions UG strives to ensure high platform availability. Continuous or uninterrupted availability cannot be guaranteed.

externalContractors.title: External Contractors
externalContractors.body: Clients may engage external contractors to deliver their services. The client is solely responsible for the actions and compliance of such contractors.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: Maped Solutions UG is liable only for damages caused by intent or gross negligence. In cases of slight negligence, liability is limited to breaches of essential contractual obligations and foreseeable damages.
limitations: No liability for services provided by the client or external contractors.
No liability for data loss if appropriate backup measures were in place.
No liability for indirect damages or loss of profit.

payments.title: Payments
payments.body: Payments and billing are governed by the agreements concluded between Maped Solutions UG and the client. The platform itself does not provide payment services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.body: The usage relationship may be terminated by either party in accordance with the agreed notice periods. Statutory termination rights remain unaffected.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.body: Personal data is processed in accordance with the Privacy Policy of this platform and applicable data protection laws.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.body: The laws of the Federal Republic of Germany apply, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.

changes.title: Changes to these Terms
changes.body: Maped Solutions UG reserves the right to amend these Terms for legal or operational reasons. The current version is available on this platform.

hero.subtitle: This page contains the legally required information about the provider of this website.

providerSection.heading: Service Provider Information
providerSection.description: Provider details as required by applicable European laws:

responsibleSection.heading: Responsible for Content pursuant to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
responsibleSection.description: The person responsible for the content of this website is:
responsibleSection.name: Hasan Al Al-Hayyawi

liabilitySection.heading: Disclaimer
liabilitySection.text: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

odrSection.heading: Online Dispute Resolution (ODR)
odrSection.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
odrSection.note: We are not obliged or willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

support.heading: Support tickets
support.description: Describe the issue and we will create a support ticket for you.

page.title: Property Managers
page.subtitle: Manage contact details, access status, and building assignments for your team.

confirm.activateDescription: This manager will regain access to the dashboard.
confirm.deactivateDescription: This manager will lose access to the dashboard.

form.editSubtitle: Update the manager details and status.

form.successEditDescription: The property manager has been updated successfully.
